mapper.select: SELECT QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSU.USE_SEQ, QSU.SMP_USE_PROC, QSM.ANS_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.ANS_TYP) AS ANS_TYP_NM, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND SCD.DTL_CD = QSU.SMP_USE_PROC) AS SMP_USE_NM, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL, QSU.USE_SMP_VOL, QS.SUM_VOL, QS.REMAINS, QSM.INP_UNIT, QSU.USE_PPS, QSU.USE_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = QSU.USE_UID) AS USE_NM, QSU.USE_DT, QSU.STRG_PLA, QSU.SMP_USE_APR_IDX, QSU.RJT_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USER_ID = QSU.RJT_UID) AS RJT_NM, QSU.RJT_DS, QSU.RJT_REA, QPAP.ANS_NO, QPAI.ANS_IDX, QSM.LOT_NO, QSM.BATCH_NO, QSM.PITM_CD, QSM.PITM_NM, QSM.PITM_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM, QSM.SMP_DIV_CD, QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC) AS SMP_DPS_NM, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = SMP_DIV_CD) AS SMP_DIV_NM FROM QS_SMP_USE QSU LEFT JOIN (SELECT QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL, SUM(USE_SMP_VOL) AS SUM_VOL, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL - SUM(USE_SMP_VOL) AS REMAINS FROM QS_SMP_USE QSU LEFT JOIN QS_SMP_MNG QSM ON QSU.PLNT_CD = QSM.PLNT_CD and QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX WHERE QSU.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QSM.SMP_DIV_CD = 'S0260001' AND QSM.ANS_TYP = 'S0230004' GROUP BY QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL) QS ON QS.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX LEFT JOIN QS_SMP_MNG QSM ON QSU.PLNT_CD = QSM.PLNT_CD AND QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO QPAI on QSM.PLNT_CD = QPAI.PLNT_CD and QSM.ANS_IDX = QPAI.ANS_IDX LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP on QPAI.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD and QPAI.ANS_IDX = QPAP.ANS_IDX WHERE QSU.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QSU.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QSM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QSM.SMP_DIV_CD = 'S0260001' AND QSM.ANS_TYP = 'S0230004' ORDER BY QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX DESC

mapper.select: SELECT QSM.PLNT_CD, QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = SMP_DPS_PROC) AS SMP_DPS_NM, QSM.PITM_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.ANS_TYP) AS ANS_TYP_NM, QSM.PITM_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = QSM.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM, QSM.PITM_NM, QSM.ANS_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.ANS_TYP) AS ANS_TYP_NM, QSM.ANS_IDX, QSM.SMP_DIV_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.SMP_DIV_CD) AS SMP_DIV_NM, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL, QSM.SMP_STRG_MTD, QSM.SMP_VOL_UNIT, QSM.LOT_NO, QSM.BATCH_NO, QSM.INP_UNIT, QSM.MAK_DT, QSM.STRG_LMT, QSM.USE_LMT, QSM.IRG_YN, QSM.SMP_RMK, QSM.DPS_EXP_DT, QSM.SMP_DPS_APR_IDX, QSM.SMP_ETR_DT, QPAP.ANS_NO, NVL(QS.SUM_VOL, 0) AS SUM_VOL, NVL(QS.REMAINS, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL) AS REMAINS FROM QS_SMP_MNG QSM LEFT JOIN (SELECT QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, SUM(USE_SMP_VOL) AS SUM_VOL, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL - SUM(USE_SMP_VOL) AS REMAINS FROM QS_SMP_USE QSU LEFT JOIN QS_SMP_MNG QSM ON QSU.PLNT_CD = QSM.PLNT_CD AND QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX WHERE QSU.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY QSU.PLNT_CD, QSU.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL) QS ON QS.PLNT_CD = QSM.PLNT_CD AND QS.SMP_MNG_IDX = QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO QPAI ON QSM.PLNT_CD = QPAI.PLNT_CD AND QSM.ANS_IDX = QPAI.ANS_IDX LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP on QPAI.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD and QPAI.ANS_IDX = QPAP.ANS_IDX WHERE QSM.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC = 'S0270300' AND QSM.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QSM.DPS_YN = 'N' AND QSM.SMP_DIV_CD = 'S0260001' AND QSM.ANS_TYP = 'S0230004' ORDER BY QSM.SMP_ETR_DT DESC
